intro.signup.label: Social login
teamingCriteria.title: Teaming Criteria
teamingCriteria.vi: Teaming criteria for visually impaired runners
teamingCriteria.content.1: - All participants will be assigned to the team according to the submitted personal records
teamingCriteria.content.2: - The partners will be matched according to the assigned team when you apply for events in the future
teamingCriteria.content.3: - Please refer to below for the team assignment criteria
signup.form.info.title: Personal Information
signup.form.info.id.label: Please enter a ID
signup.form.info.id.check.success: This is an available ID. Do you want to use it?
signup.form.info.id.check.failed: This ID is already in use. Please enter a different ID.
signup.form.info.id.error: The ID must be less than 15 characters long and contain only English, numbers, and underscores (_). are allowed.
signup.form.info.password.label: Please enter a Password
signup.form.info.password.confirm.error: The passwords are not the same.
signup.form.info.password.error: Password must be at least 8 and no more than 32 characters long, including English, special characters, and numbers.
signup.form.info.email.label: Please enter your email
signup.form.info.name: Name
signup.form.info.name.label: Please enter your name
signup.form.info.tel.label: Please enter your personal number
signup.form.running.title: My Running spec
signup.form.running.record.label: Record
signup.form.running.detail.label: Please fill out the Specific record
signup.form.running.location.label: Please write down where you usually run
signup.form.running.vi.guide.name: Your partner's(Guide) name
signup.form.running.guide.experience: Experience of Guide running for Blind runner
If you don't remember, please write 'don't remember'
signup.form.running.guide.experience.pac: Please let us know the pace per 1km of the partner at the time
signup.form.running.guide.experience.cou: Please share your specific experience of guide running
signup.form.running.way: How did you come to know about this program?
signup.form.running.way.guide.2: Via acquaintance from a club or a crew
signup.form.running.way.guide.3: By witnessing the blind runners at the training places or race event.
signup.form.running.way.guide.4: By learning from Jaydon's Guide running training.
signup.form.running.way.vi.2: Via running club(other than VMK) or recommendation of acquaintance
signup.form.running.reason: Please share the moment you decided to join us.
signup.form.running.reason.label: Please share the moment you decided to join us.
signup.form.running.group: Run groups you can join as a guide runner
signup.form.running.group.label: Based on 10km
signup.form.running.request.label: Please let us know if there are any information that we need to know to proceed with the program with you
signup.intro.title: Sign up
signup.complete.title: Signup complete
signup.terms.privacy.title: Agreement to provide and utilize personal information
signup.terms.privacy.1:
1. Purpose of collecting and using personal information: 
Use to conduct programs such as sending guidance SMS to participants and matching for other events
signup.terms.privacy.2:
2. Personal information items to be collected:
 Personal information(name, gender, age, personal number, place of residence, personal running record, experience of guiderunning, SNS account, kakaotalk ID)
signup.terms.privacy.3:
3. Retention and use of personal information:
 From the time of application to the time of notification
signup.terms.privacy.4: 4. Please understand that you cannot participate in the program if you refuse to consent.
signup.terms.likeness.title: Consent to utilize likeness rights
signup.terms.likeness.1:
1. Purpose of collection use and provision: 
PR via SNS post and other channels
signup.terms.likeness.2:
2. Retention and use of portrait rights: 
Until the post promoted is deleted
signup.terms.likeness.3:
3. Second use of portrait rights: 
Producing and publishing online and offline promotional materials
signup.terms.likeness.4: 4. You have the right to refuse consent to use portrait rights, and if you refuse, you will be excluded from the production of educational promotional materials or mosaicized.
signup.terms.likeness.5: 5. The work will be edited and nominated to the extent that it does not infringe on personality.
